description: This file defines a reusable Button component in React with customizable variants and sizes, utilizing class-variance-authority for styling variants and forwarding refs.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A React component that renders a customizable button with variant and size options, supporting asChild prop for rendering different element types.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A React forwardRef component that renders a button or Slot component based on asChild prop, applying styling variants and forwarding refs.
